content: inspired by this post, let's use this topic to coordinate pairing on contributions!
I'm planning to work on roc glue on either Thursday or Friday this week - if anyone's interested in pairing on that, let me know here!
Since I have no preferences yet and I’m still exploring the codebase - I‘d be happy to join! What time do you plan to work on it?
@Kiryl Dziamura I'm planning to start at 2023-07-06T11:15:00-04:00 - lmk if that works for you!

I can join around 15 minutes later. Just to understand the context better - what would you recommend to familiarize myself with?
The crate, a paper, an issue, an article? I mean, I know what the glue code is, just want to be prepared for the problem

if you want to look at the glue code, sure! I have two goals:

  1. have roc glue automatically discover hosted modules for the given platform and generate any necessary glue for them
  2. allow giving roc glue an app instead of a platform, and have it automatically discover the app's platform and then proceed as usual on that platform
will do soon! I'm not quite ready to start yet
@Richard Feldman can you please add me to the reviewers when you’re ready?
Oh man, sorry I missed this. Thanks for starting this up, Richard. Hope to join in next time!
